sentences.en: After that he applies the last component of his secret formula.
sentences.cn: 然后他使用秘密配方里的最后一种元素.

sentences.en: Clever exploitation of the latest technology would be a sure formula for success.
sentences.cn: 对最新技术的灵活利用必将带来成功。

sentences.en: Formula One motor car racing is supposed to be dangerous. "Indycar" racing is supposed to be more dangerous still.
sentences.cn: 据说，一级方程式赛车很危险，而“印第赛车”相比更危险。

sentences.en: I have decided to retire from Formula One racing at the end of the season.
sentences.cn: 我已经决定在这个赛季末结束一级方程式赛车生涯。

sentences.en: It is a formula that worked very well indeed.
sentences.cn: 这的确是一套很管用的方案。

sentences.en: Someone has stolen the secret formula for the liquid that fires our new spaceship.
sentences.cn: 有人偷了我们发射太空船所用的液体燃料的秘方.

sentences.en: Sugar is represented by the simple formula CHO.
sentences.cn: 糖以简单的分子式CHO表示。

sentences.en: Take it from me— this is the greatest achievement by any Formula One driver ever.
sentences.cn: 信我的没错——这是一级方程式赛车手有史以来所取得的最高成就。

sentences.en: The chemical formula for water is H 2 O.
sentences.cn: 水的化学分子式是H2O.

sentences.en: The foreign ministers have thrashed out a suitable compromise formula.
sentences.cn: 外交部长们经过反复讨论，已经制订出合适的折中方案。

sentences.en: the formula for calculating distance
sentences.cn: 计算距离的公式

sentences.en: The formula in Hollywood is simple—money talks.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞的生存规则很简单，就是金钱万能。

sentences.en: The formula is jealously guarded.
sentences.cn: 配方被小心翼翼地收藏着。

sentences.en: There is no magic formula (= a method that is certain to be successful ) that will transform sorrow into happiness.
sentences.cn: 没有妙方可以化悲为喜。

sentences.en: They are working on the perfection of their new paint formula.
sentences.cn: 他们正在研制完善的新颜料配方.

sentences.en: This formula is used to calculate the area of a circle.
sentences.cn: 这个公式用于计算圆的面积。

sentences.en: This was surely a magic formula for Old Fan as his head ached each time he heard it.
sentences.cn: 对老范来说,这就是紧箍咒,每回一听说起保管头痛.

sentences.en: Use the formula to calculate the volume of the container.
sentences.cn: 用公式计算容器的容积。

sentences.en: We’re still searching for a peace formula.
sentences.cn: 我们仍在寻找和平方案。

sentences.en: With viewing figures up a million, the programme has a winning formula .
sentences.cn: 收视人数增加了一百万，这个节目的确拥有吸引观众的法宝。
